WorkItem.Description:
Since 5.0.4 I have been unable to reload my character from battle.net with either spec that I'm trying to work with.  So I have to manually put in everything.

Character name: Ashur  Spec: feral and guardian  Server: Thrall (US Alliance)
Here is the error I receive.

I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.

== Version: 5.0.4.0 WPF ==

== Error Message ==
The remote server returned an error: (503) Server Unavailable.

== StackTrace ==
at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
Tried to reload current character from battle.net

I always receive this error no matter when I try.
